Survey.Name: Patient Health Questionnaire-9
Survey.Description: 9-item self-report questionnaire for depression screening and severity measurement. Assesses the presence and frequency of depressive symptoms over the past two weeks.
Survey.Citation: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The PHQ-9: validity of a brief depression severity measure. J Gen Intern Med. 2001;16(9):606-613. doi:10.1046/j.1525-1497.2001.016009606.x

Scores.Name: phq9_total
Scores.Description: Total depression severity score (sum of all 9 items)
Scores.Note: Higher scores indicate greater depression severity. Clinical cutoffs: minimal (0-4), mild (5-9), moderate (10-14), moderately severe (15-19), severe (20-27)
